metadata.Title: CVE-2016-2073 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description:
The htmlParseNameComplex function in HTMLparser.c in libxml2 allows attackers to cause a denial of service (out-of-bounds read) via a crafted XML document.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-2073` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libxml2 - 2.9.3+dfsg1-1ubuntu0.1
libxml2-utils - 2.9.3+dfsg1-1ubuntu0.1
python-libxml2 - 2.9.3+dfsg1-1ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

notes.Note: mdeslaur> this is a dupe of CVE-2016-1839

criterions.comment: libxml2 package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.9.3+dfsg1-1ubuntu0.1').
